details.title: Union Home Minister makes a statement on NRC draft list
details.content: Whole procedure of NRC Assam was undertaken under supervision of Supreme Court. I would like to repeat that its a draft and not final, everyone will get chance to appeal. Its a totally fair process. Unwarranted accusations are unfortunate: HM Rajnath Singh in Rajya Sabha

details.title: TMC delegation was detained due to 'unruly behaviour'
details.content: TMC delegation was received as per protocol and were apprised about Section 144. The delegation members indulged in "unruly behaviour" which inconvnienced the passengers at Silchar Airport, says Rajnath Singh.

details.title: 'Undeclared Emergency'
details.content: Earlier, TMC's Kalyan Banerjee raised the issue of 40 lakh people who were left out in the NRC draft. He further claimed the arrest was made as per the SC directives. Pointing to the manhandled of women MPs which was aired on every news channel, he calls it a breach of privilege of parliamentarians and asks "is this not an undeclared emergency"
TRS MP K. Kavitha during the Monsoon session of Parliament in New Delhi on Friday (Photo | PTI)
Ex-BCCI chief Anurag Thakur continues the speech lauding the Sports Ministry to choose Manipur as the place for the University.
Sports Minister Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore had on Wednesday introduced the National Sports University Bill, 2018 on Wednesday which was seeking to establish a National Sports University in Manipur.

details.title: BJD MP Kalikesh Narayan Singh Deo says the government needs to provide minimalist facilities.
details.content: We need to have one center of excillence in every state. Main issue of the bill is the curricullum. I would like to know what the curriculum is when the minister answers the question. The government should also tell us what will be funding of these institutes. We have seen the instances of sexual assault on women sportsperson. It is a failure of the sports bodies. We need to have clearly defined roles for gender appreciation and gender sensitivity.

details.title: The story of hockey has become a story of lost glory says M B Rajesh of CPI-M
details.content: Recently we a small country like Croatia reached final of football world cup. We are not able to succeed due to lack of priority. There is film called 'Soorma'. The story of Hockey has become a story of lost glory.

details.title: Enhancment of Parliament Productivity Bill introduced by Naresh Gujral of SAD in Rajya sabha
details.content: Parliament should meet at least 120 days. Today when we would add the number of hours disrupted to the session there would be no disruption. Because the session is not long enough the small parties suffer. We can only get adequate time if the session is long enough.
Today we spent less time than what we used to in the 1950s and 60s: Jairam Ramesh, INC in Rajya Sabha

details.title: Disruptive members should not be given salary says YSRC MP Vijaysai Reddy in Rajya Sabha
details.content: Once a member enters a house irrespective of the political party he/she should be given equal time. The time lost in the house disruptions should be compensated and the members who are involved in the disruptions should not be given salary.

details.title: Vijila Satyanath of AIADMK speaks in Rajya Sabha
details.content: We have to make space for Private Members Bill. We passed the Transgenders Bill brought in by Tiruchi Siva. But what happened to it. The government brought in a new bill and the old Bill was replaced. So private members bill should be given more space.

details.title: The MoS for Sports, Colonel Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore says they increased the allowances of players
details.content: "I would like to put here three things, Stipend of the player which is increased to Rs 2000 per month. The food allowance: We have increased it to Rs 690 per day. Supplement allowance is raised to Rs 700 per day and this is for under training players. For international players we have increased the stipend to Rs 50000 per month This is the first time Prime Minister has introduced an Olympic task force. A national coach is now paid 2 lakh an increase of 100%"

details.title: Congress MP Husain Dalwai speaks
details.content: Gauri Lankesh, Kalburgi, Pansare all were killed but nothing happened. Maharashtra government was going to bring a Bill which would allow police to check what is cooking in one's kitchen. So these kinds of issues need to be addressed. We enter the well only when our issues are not being heard. But the working of the house is the responsibility of the government. And this has been told to us by Arum Jaitleyji, which is right.

details.title: Lok Sabha discusses Private Member's bill amendments to the Sixth Schedule in the Constitution Bill 2015
details.content:
The Bill is introduced by Vincent Pala. It grants more power to the District and Regional Councils.
The Sixth Schedule of the Indian Constitution is for the administration of tribal areas of the four North Eastern States. Under this schedule,
Tribal areas in these states had been constituted as an autonomous district.
President at any time by order may direct the formation or termination of any area under tribal area.
Each autonomous district has a district council of 30 members and also contains separate regional councils.
Governor can appoint a commission to examine and report any matter relating to the administration of autonomous district of regions.
Matters of urgent public importance are being heard in Lok Sabha.
Lok Sabha adjourned till Monday 6 august 11:00 am.
Lok Sabha adjourned sine die.
